actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide that C.J. Dugan and Otero Mills, Incorporated, may file a claim against the United States in the Court of Claims, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Grants jurisdiction to the Court of Claims to render judgment upon the claim of a named individual and a named corporation against the United States.

titles.title: A bill to provide that C.J. Dugan and Otero Mills, Incorporated, may file a claim against the United States in the Court of Claims, and for other purposes.
